bibl.title: The Leatherwork from Deir el-Bachit: Preliminary Report.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Leather research in Egypt. - The finds: Book covers; - Footwear. - Skin identification / processing, manufacturing of objects. - Non-diagnostic finds. - Discussion.
